casebody.data:
(September 21, 1961)

In decisions Nos. 1-41 the court is as follows: Present■—Bergan, P. J., Coon, Gibson, Herlihy and Taylor, JJ.

James Fiorillo, by Frank Fiorillo, His Guardian ad Litem, et al., Plaintiffs, v. Gino Zampa et al., Defendants.

Appeal dismissed, without costs, unless appellants shall file and serve record, brief and note of issue on or before December 1, 1961 and be ready for argument at the January 1962 Term of this court, in which event the motion is denied.
